problem_text_cn: 如图,正六边形ABCDEF内接于⊙O,若⊙O的半径为6,则阴影部分的面积为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the regular hexagon ABCDEF is inscribed in ⊙O. If the radius of ⊙O is N_0, the area of ​​the shaded part is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图所示:连接BO,CO,OA,∵正六边形ABCDEF内接于⊙O,∴△OAB,△OBC都是等边三角形,∴∠AOB=∠OBC=60°,∴S_{△ABC}=S_{△OBC},∴S_{阴}=S_{扇形OBC}∴图中阴影部分面积为:S_{扇形OBC}=\frac{60·π·6²}{360}=6π.故选B.
